snippet.title: Narin: The Orange Room - Official Reveal Teaser (Wishlist now on Steam!)
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2050710/Narin_The_Orange_Room/ 

What if those scary school stories are true, and you must confront them?
Help Narin, a girl whose sister had disappeared, escape those evil spirits. Solve the puzzles and use the knowledge gathered during the day from the "school ghost story" as a clue to confront the darkness in this twilight zone.

Get in touch with us through our channels
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NarinProject/ 
Discord: https://discord.gg/j5AWEBVNEJ
Twitter: https://twitter.com/NarintheGame
